    <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
    <entry>MELT-04602180.5</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04602180.5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04602180.5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Erdölförderung in der Wüste</string>
            <string language="en">Desert oil production</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Production de pétrole de désert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Produção de óleo do deserto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Produzione di petrolio del deserto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή πετρελαίου ερήμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Producción petrolífera del desierto</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Arbeitsblatt zum Vorkommen von Erdöl zwischen Gesteinsschichten. Weiterführende Frage zu den Veränderungen im Nahen Osten seit der Entdeckung des Erdöls.</string>
            <string language="en">Worksheet on oil deposits between rock formations. Further question about the changes that have taken place in the Middle East since the discovery of oil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Erdöl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Naher Osten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">The Near East</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau sur des gisements d'huile entre les 
formations de roche. Promouvez la question au sujet des 
changements qui sont intervenus dans le Moyen-Orient depuis la 
découverte d'huile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha em depósitos de óleo entre formações de
rocha. Promova a pergunta sobre as mudanças que ocorreram em o 
Oriente Médio desde a descoberta do óleo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro sui giacimenti di olio fra le 
formazioni rocciose. Avanzi la domanda circa i cambiamenti che 
hanno avvenuto in Medio Oriente dalla scoperta di olio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας στις καταθέσεις πετρελαίου μεταξύ των 
σχηματισμών βράχου. Περαιτέρω ερώτηση για τις αλλαγές που 
έχουν πραγματοποιηθεί στη Μέση Ανατολή από την ανακάλυψη του 
πετρελαίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja de trabajo en depósitos de petróleo entre 
las formaciones de roca. Fomente la pregunta sobre los cambios 
que han ocurrido en el Oriente Medio desde el descubrimiento del 
aceite.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Huile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Proche Orient</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Óleo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Leste Próximo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Olio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Medio Oriente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πετρέλαιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγγύς Ανατολή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aceite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Cercano Oriente</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
